ref: 9242 bimba m.n. ʻ round form (of sun or moon) ʼ MārkP., (in general) MBh., ʻ a form and its reflexion ʼ R., ʻ image, reflexion ʼ BhP., bimbaka -- n. ʻ round form ʼ BHSk., ˚bikā -- f. lex., vimba -- n. ʻ image of sun (?) ʼ ŚvetUp.
Pa. bimba -- n. ʻ image, shape ʼ;
Or. bimbā ʻ disc of sun or moon ʼ,
